author: Edgar Acuna and Alex Rojas
title: Ensembles of classifiers based on Kernel density estimators
venue: Department of Mathematics University of Puerto Rico
window: All of them have been analyzed already in a combining setup and nine of these datasets were analyzed in the Statlog Project (Michie, et. al. 1994). B) To make an analysis of the bias-variance decomposition for the misclassification error when classifiers based in kernel density
